languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
It suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} and deals {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} mental damage to melee attackers.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Alan saldırılarından{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} almaz. Yakın dövüş saldırısıyla her vurulduğunda saldırgana anında {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} verir.

languages.text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.
Он не получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}. Получая урон от атаки в ближнем бою, он немедленно наносит {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} атаковавшему.

Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+10される。
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}からの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けない。近接攻撃を受けるたびに、攻撃者に対して即座に{uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a}{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
It suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Whenever it is hit by a melee attack, it immediately deals {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the attacker.

traits.locale_text:
サーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}が+10される。
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}からの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けない。近接攻撃を受けるたびに、攻撃者に対して即座に{uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a}{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Er erleidet keinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}. Wird er von einem Nahkampfangriff getroffen, fügt er dem Angreifer sofort {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
It suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Whenever it is hit by a melee attack, it immediately deals {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the attacker.

traits.locale_text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}.
Er erleidet keinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g}. Wird er von einem Nahkampfangriff getroffen, fügt er dem Angreifer sofort {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} zu.

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
No sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Cuando sufre un impacto de ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, inflige inmediatamente {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} al atacante.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
It suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Whenever it is hit by a melee attack, it immediately deals {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the attacker.

traits.locale_text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} e {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}.
No sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Cuando sufre un impacto de ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, inflige inmediatamente {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} al atacante.

languages.text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点。
伺服头骨集群不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。每当伺服头骨集群被近战攻击命中时，都会立刻对攻击者造成{uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a}点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}.
It suffers no {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Whenever it is hit by a melee attack, it immediately deals {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the attacker.

traits.locale_text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}提高10点。
伺服头骨集群不会受到{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。每当伺服头骨集群被近战攻击命中时，都会立刻对攻击者造成{uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a}点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} et d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} de +10.
Il ne subit pas de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g}. Chaque fois qu'il est touché par une attaque de mêlée, il inflige immédiatement {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à l'attaquant.

Chaque fois qu'il est touché par une attaque de mêlée, il inflige immédiatement {uip|Damage|d9b527f50267467f9c2d10542c92b90a} de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} à l'attaquant.
